query:
-- إسناد الأدوار للمستخدمين التجريبيين
INSERT INTO user_roles (user_id, role_id, assigned_by, assigned_at)
SELECT u.id, 'projects_office', 1, NOW()
FROM users u
WHERE u.openId = 'test_projects_office_001'
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = u.id AND role_id = 'projects_office');

INSERT INTO user_roles (user_id, role_id, assigned_by, assigned_at)
SELECT u.id, 'field_team', 1, NOW()
FROM users u
WHERE u.openId = 'test_field_team_002'
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = u.id AND role_id = 'field_team');

INSERT INTO user_roles (user_id, role_id, assigned_by, assigned_at)
SELECT u.id, 'financial', 1, NOW()
FROM users u
WHERE u.openId = 'test_financial_003'
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = u.id AND role_id = 'financial');

INSERT INTO user_roles (user_id, role_id, assigned_by, assigned_at)
SELECT u.id, 'service_requester', 1, NOW()
FROM users u
WHERE u.openId = 'test_service_requester_004'
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = u.id AND role_id = 'service_requester');

-- عرض النتائج
SELECT 
  u.name,
  u.email,
  r.nameAr AS role_name,
  ur.assigned_at
FROM user_roles ur
JOIN users u ON ur.user_id = u.id
JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id
WHERE u.openId LIKE 'test_%'
ORDER BY ur.assigned_at DESC;
